bug.author: azev77
bug.description: In the <denchmark-link:https://www.mlpack.org/doc/mlpack-git/doxygen/julia_quickstart.html>Julia Quickstart</denchmark-link> it says: test, test_labels, train, train_labels = mlpack.preprocess_split( input=dataset, input_labels=labels, test_ratio=0.3) The first argument is not a keyword argument. It should say: test, test_labels, train, train_labels = mlpack.preprocess_split( dataset, input_labels=labels, test_ratio=0.3)

comments.comment: There is another typo: It says: Pkg.add("Zlib") It should say: Pkg.add("Libz");
